episodes.title: Sisters Share Story of Escaping Their Father’s Cult
episodes.description:
Anna and Celia LeBaron were born into one of the most dangerous polygamous cults in history and their father was the leader. Anna joined DBL to tell us about growing up in the cult and escaping at age 13.  

#cult #survivor #polygamy

episodes.title: Leah Remini Is Now Suing After Years of Speaking out Against the Church of Scientology
episodes.description:
Leah Remini posted a long press release detailing her claims of psychological torture, defamation, surveillance, harassment, and intimidation. She was a member of the church for more than 35 years before she walked away in 2013. Since then, she's been speaking out against the church. 

Our hosts discuss why Scientology has been so untouchable and if that is now changing.

#leahremini #churchofscientology #davidmiscavige

episodes.title: Manson Cult Member Released From Prison After 53 Years. Did the Parole Board Make the Right Call?
episodes.description:
Charles Manson and four members of his cult 'family' were all sentenced to life in prison for one of the most notorious murder rampages in history. Now one of them is paroled.

The panel discusses the parole board's actions.

#leslievanhouten #manson #mansonfamily #Cult #parole

episodes.title: 'He Doesn't Really Teach the Bible:' How Jinger Duggar Vuolo's Husband Jeremy Helped Her Break Free
episodes.description:
Jinger Duggar Vuolo last week on DBL shared her experience of growing up under the teaching of Bill Gothard and his 'Institute of Basic Life Principles,' describing it as 'very cult-like.'

Watch last week's interview: https://youtu.be/aUu-mi2S4fQ

In her new book, 'Becoming Free Indeed: My Story of Disentangling Faith From Fear,' Jinger opens up about stepping away from the teachings, an act that wouldn't have been possible without her husband Jeremy.

The pair joined DBL to open up about the journey. 

#jingerduggar #JingerVuolo #tlc #JeremyVuolo #19kidsandcounting #countingon #joshduggar #IPLB #BillGothard #Cult

episodes.title: 'I Wonder If We're the Bad Guys:' Daniella Mestyanek Young on Escaping 'Children of God' Cult
episodes.description:
Members of the organization 'Children of God' called themselves 'the family,' but in reality were far from it. 

'Children of God' was a cult, and Daniella Mestyanek Young was a third-generation member before she finally escaped in an act of bravery at the age of 15. 

She joined us to tell us the moment that triggered her escape, the parallels she found during her military service, and how she worked through her traumas.

Her book and audiobook 'Uncultured' is available where books are sold. 

https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/59808316-uncultured

#DaniellaMestyanekYoung #childrenofgod #cults #Uncultured
